title: Stuffed turkey rolls with lentils
ingredients: ['4 skinless turkey breast steaks, about 500 g (1 lb 2 oz) in total', '1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 parsnip, cut into 1 cm (½ in) cubes', '2 carrots, cut into 1 cm (½ in) cubes', '1 tbsp plain flour', '600 ml (1 pint) chicken stock, preferably home-made', '2 tsp Dijon mustard', '1 can whole peeled chestnuts, about 240 g, drained', '200 g (7 oz) Puy lentils', '2 tsp balsamic vinegar', 'salt and pepper', 'sprigs of fresh flat-leaf parsley to garnish', 'Apricot stuffing', '1 onion, finely chopped', '75 g (2½ oz) ready-to-eat dried apricots, finely chopped', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '75 g (2½ oz) fresh breadcrumbs', '3 tbsp chopped parsley', '1 egg yolk', 'grated zest and juice of 1 orange']
